title: 3 and Out - Tyreek’s Chiefs Beef, Matty Ice Comeback (?) Hold-Ins, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Tyreek’s Chiefs Beef, Matty Ice Comeback (?) Hold-Ins, Mailbag
description:
John discusses Lamar Jackson’s decision to show up to Ravens minicamp, if Tyreek has a point with his beef about how the Chiefs used him, if Matt Ryan can have a big comeback season with the Colts, why Broncos first year head coach may need to make it to year 2, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Go to  FanDuel for the best wagering action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
